title: Sir Thomas Fairfax's letter to the Honorable William Lenthall Esq. speaker of the House of Commons of all the particulars concerning the taking of Bridgewater : together with a list of the persons of quality and prisoners taken in the fight and town.
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
notes: "Ordered by the Commons in Parliament that this letter be forthwith printed and published. H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com."
Caption title: To the Honourable VVilliam Lenthall, Esquire, speaker of the House of Commons.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
